attributes.action: Mrs May to stand down NOW before she does any more damage
attributes.background: Mrs May has shown she is incompetent and spineless as a leader to take us out of the EU, her constant capitulation has seen a continual humiliation of our country, she MUST stand down NOW and allow a proper leader to take over and lead us with courage and resolve to action the will of the UK people.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions which call for people to lose their job. This includes government Ministers.
